cards.title: Multiheaded Beast
setup: At the start of the game, {Hydra} enters play "Regenerating Beast" side up.
Search the villain deck for all Head cards and place them beneath this card face down. Shuffle the villain deck.
Put the top 2 cards under this card into play.
gameplay: At the start of the villain turn, this card flips.
flippedGameplay: As long as any heads are in play, {Hydra} cannot be destroyed
At the end of the villain turn, put all Head cards from the villain trash into play. Then play that many cards from under this card.

cards.title: Hydra
gameplay: At the end of the villain turn, if there are more than 2*{H} Heads in play, {Hydra} flips.
flippedGameplay: As long as any heads are in play, {Hydra} cannot be destroyed

cards.title: Head
body: At the start of the villain turn, {Head} deals the hero target with the highest HP 1 melee damage.

cards.title: Slumbering Form
body: When {SlumberingForm} enters play, destroy all other form cards.
Heads cannot deal damage
At the end of the villain turn, all heads gain 1 HP and {Hydra} regains 1 HP for each head in play.

cards.title: Guarding Form
body: When {SlumberingForm} enters play, destroy all other form cards.
When {Hydra} would be dealt damage, redirect that damage to the head with the lowest HP.

cards.title: Blocking Form
body: When {BlockingForm} enters play, destroy all other form cards.
Decrease the damage dealt to heads by 1.
Decrease the damage dealt to {Hydra} by the number of heads in play.

cards.title: Enraged Form
body: When {EnragedForm} enters play, destroy all other form cards.
Increase melee damage dealt by {Hydra} by the number of heads in play.

cards.title: Rampage
body: {Hydra} deals {H} melee damage to all other targets.

cards.title: Multi-bite
body: Each head in play deals the hero target with the highest HP 1 melee damage.

cards.title: Surprise Bite
body: Put the top card under {RulesCard} into play.
That head deals the hero target with the lowest HP 1 melee damage.

cards.title: Entangling Necks
body: When {EntanglingNecks} enters play, place it next to a hero.
At the start of that hero's turn, {Hydra} deals them {H}-2 melee damage.
When that hero destroys a head, destroy this card

cards.title: Focused Crush
body: The head with the highest HP deals the hero target with the highest HP X melee damage, where X is the number of heads in play + 1

cards.title: Self Snackrifice
body: Destroy all heads in play.
{Hydra} gains 3 HP for each head in the villain trash.

cards.title: Sudden Sprouting
body: Play the top {H} cards under {RulesCard}.

cards.title: Acid Blood
body: Whenever a hero destroys a head, {Hydra} deal that hero {H-2} toxic damage.

cards.title: Jaw Crush
body: Each hero destorys 1 equipment card.
{Hydra} deals any hero who does not {H} melee damage

cards.title: Thundering Roar
body: {Hydra} deals each non-villain target {H} sonic damage.
